actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Marian Law Shale Holloway, Adeline Mary Gill Charles, and Eliza Shale Carstens.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to pay three individuals in full settlement of such individuals' claims against the United States.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Marian Law Shale Holloway, Adeline Mary Gill Charles, and Eliza Shale Carstens.
